---
category: news
title: "Rats use strategies to make object choices in spontaneous object recognition tasks"
excerpt: "Rodent spontaneous object recognition (SOR) paradigms are widely used to study the mechanisms of complex memory in many laboratories. Due to the absence of explicit reinforcement in these tasks, there is an underlying assumption that object exploratory behaviour is ‘spontaneous’."
